title: bAlasubrahmanyam bhajEham
sahitya:
bAlasubrahmaNyam bhajEham bhakta kalpa bhUruham shrI


anupallavi

 nIlakaNTha hrdAnandakaram nitya shuddha buddha muktAmbaram


caraNam   vElAyudha dharam sundaram vEdAntArtha bOdha caturam phAlAkSa guruguha
avatAram parAshakti sukumAram dhIram pAlita gIrvANAdi samUham panca bhUtamaya 
mAyAmOham nIlakaNTha vAham sudEham niratishayAnanda pravAham
